statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); project_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.project_dir'); output_style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); project_name=$(basename "$project_dir"); relative_path=$(echo "${current_dir#$project_dir}"); if [ "$relative_path" = "$current_dir" ]; then relative_path=""; elif [ "$relative_path" != "" ]; then relative_path="${relative_path#/}"; fi; git_branch=$(cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ""); git_info=""; if [ "$git_branch" != "" ]; then git_info=" $git_branch"; fi; style_info=""; if [ "$output_style" != "default" ] && [ "$output_style" != "null" ]; then style_info=" [$output_style]"; fi; printf " %s%s %s%s%s%s" "$model" "$style_info" "$project_name" "$([ "$relative_path" != "" ] && echo "/$relative_path" || echo "")" "$git_info"
